mapper.select: SELECT tdTaskId, tdSourceId, tdMode, tdIncrementColumn, tdTableName,tdColumns,tdTargetTableName,tdDispatch,tdRemarks FROM TAB_DATA_MIGRATE_TASKDESCTION ORDER BY tdTaskId DESC
SELECT tdTaskId, tdSourceId, tdMode, tdIncrementColumn, tdTableName,tdColumns,tdTargetTableName,tdDispatch,tdRemarks FROM TAB_DATA_MIGRATE_TASKDESCTION WHERE tdTaskId=#{tdTaskId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TAB_DATA_MIGRATE_TASKDESCTION(tdTaskId, tdSourceId, tdMode, tdIncrementColumn, tdTableName,tdColumns,tdTargetTableName,tdDispatch,tdRemarks) VALUES (#{tdTaskId},#{tdSourceId},#{tdMode},#{tdIncrementColumn}, #{tdTableName},#{tdColumns},#{tdTargetTableName},#{tdDispatch},#{tdRemarks})
mapper.select: SELECT concat(max(DISTINCT(cast(SUBSTR(RATEPERCENTAGE, 0, INSTR(RATEPERCENTAGE, '%')-1) as int))),'%') RATEPERCENTAGE, TDTASKID FROM TAB_DATA_MIGRATE_PROGRESSRATE WHERE TDTASKID = #{tdTaskId} GROUP BY TDTASKID
